TopicTitle: whould it be posable to add moon(s)

Articles.Content: or a moon orbiting a moon, orbiting the planet. or other planets? that also brings up another question then; how about a lunar/ planet lander? if that then how about Extra-vehicular activity? just curious really

these things are all planned for the future

i dont know when exactly but at some time in the future these thing will get implemented

Cheers
his avatar makes me wonder....

his avatar makes me wonder....

mwhauauahahah
These are planned for future updates , may take a while
someone could make the moon a giant fuel tank or something like a balloon that inflates

Lander, Check

Mun, Check

Just browse the addons section or the kerbal space repository. You'll find them

someone could make the moon a giant fuel tank or something like a balloon that inflates

You mean like this?

Long story short, the good news is that yes, it is possible to add a moon. The bad news is that you're going to have to launch it into orbit yourself.

On 7/15/2011 at 1:33 PM, techtakular said:

or a moon orbiting a moon, orbiting the planet.

This has been done, in the OPM mod.  Tal is a moon of Wal which in turn is a moon of Urlum.

It's also been long enough since the original question was asked that there could be KSP players out there who weren't born yet when it was asked. 

I think it's safe to say that anything people were talking about in KSP over six years ago is hardly likely to be technically relevant now.  Accordingly, locking the thread to prevent further confusion.  If anyone has questions/comments on the topic of solar system modding, feel free to spin up a new thread, or use one of the existing ones.

Thank you for your understanding.
